tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
  location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255),
latitude FLOAT,
longitude FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE regions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255),
area FLOAT,
centroid_point GEOMETRY);

CREATE TABLE boundaries (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
region_id INT,
boundary_shape POLYGON,
FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(id));

CREATE TABLE points_of_interest (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(255),
location_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id));

CREATE TABLE visits (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
poi_id INT,
visit_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY (poi_id) REFERENCES points_of_interest(id));
